System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium 3 - 700MHz or better
RAM: 256MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Sound Card: 16-bit
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Daycare Nightmare_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Baby monsters need love too! Pitch in at daycare and nurture a slew of baby vampires, dragons, and other little beasts while their parents are at work. They need feeding and changing, just like human kids. Although there's a little twist: each monster has a special power you've got to manage. At the end of each day, you can use your tip money to buy power-ups and monster treats for the next day. This Nightmare is full of sweet nothings and a little bit of hell in a handbag.
